Sequence Information.Family: Belongs to the type A lantibiotic family (Class I bacteriocin)
Sequence Information.Target Organism: No MICs found in DRAMP database
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Predicted Structure: There is no predicted structure for DRAMP00026.
Sequence Information.Function: Lanthionine-containing peptide antibiotic (lantibiotic) active on Gram-positive bacteria. The bactericidal activity of lantibiotics is based on depolarization of energized bacterial cytoplasmic membranes, initiated by the formation of aqueous transmembrane pores.
Sequence Information.PTM: Contains one lanthionine (S17-C22) and two Beta-methyllanthionines (T9-C14; T11-C21), which is followed by membrane translocation and cleavage of the modified precursor.

Literature.Title: Isolation and characterization of the lantibiotic salivaricin A and its structural gene salA from Streptococcus salivarius 20P3.
Literature.Author: Ross KF, Ronson CW, Tagg JR.
